comprehensive_overview: PyGObject is a Python module that enables developers to access GObject-based libraries in Python. It allows Python code to interact with and use functionalities provided by libraries written in the GObject introspection format.
core_features: Facilitates interaction between Python and GObject-based libraries
Enables Python developers to utilize libraries written in the GObject introspection format
Support for GObject properties, signals, and interfaces in Python
Provides a high-level interface for working with GTK and other GNOME libraries
